fieldUpdates.description: Once the Opportunity is approved, its status is changed to "Approved"
fieldUpdates.name: Approval Status = Approved

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the field to "Not Submitted" when the opportunity is recalled from the approval process.
fieldUpdates.name: Approval Status = Not Submitted

fieldUpdates.description: Once the opportunity is submitted for approval, its status is moved to "Pending"
fieldUpdates.name: Approval Status = Pending

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Approval Status of the opportunity to "Rejected" after it was rejected.
fieldUpdates.name: Approval Status = Rejected

fieldUpdates.description: Changes the counter field once the QA request is rejected or recalled.
fieldUpdates.name: Counter - From QA to Open
Set project to In Progress if under 100%
Set implementation status to Not Started

fieldUpdates.description: Once opportunity is closed, set Type to Customer.
fieldUpdates.name: Set type to customer

fieldUpdates.description: Moves the Stage to Closed Won once the opportunity is approved.
fieldUpdates.name: Stage to Closed Won

fieldUpdates.description: Stamps date and time when the opportunity was submitted to the approval.
fieldUpdates.name: Timestamp Oppty submitted for Approval

fieldUpdates.description: Stamps the date and time when the QA was completed.
fieldUpdates.name: Timestamp QA completed

fieldUpdates.description: Stamps date and time when the QA request was rejected.
fieldUpdates.name: Timestamp QA rejected

rules.description: Sets close date to current date

rules.fullName: From Closed Won to Previous Stages Timestamp
rules.description: Stamps time when the opportunity was re-opened (moved from Closed Won to one of previous stages).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), PRIORVALUE(StageName) = "Closed Won", NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")) )

rules.description: When was the 'next step' field last updated?
Set Type to New Business when converted.
If solution owner field is not empty, set solutions required to yes
This rule updates "ARR for Bizible" field.
